MediaAsset.title: MediaAsset
MediaAsset.description: Represents an uploaded media file in the library.

title.description: An optional, searchable title for the asset.

uploadedBy.description: The UID of the user who uploaded the asset.

ShortLink.title: ShortLink
ShortLink.description: Represents a shortened URL for tracking clicks.

destinationUrl.description: The full URL the user will be redirected to.

partnerId.description: The ID of the Growth Partner who created the link.

campaign.description: An optional tag for grouping links.

JobOpening.title: JobOpening
JobOpening.description: Represents a job vacancy at Tradinta.

salary.description: A display string for salary, e.g., 'KES 50,000 - 70,000' or 'Competitive'.

hiringManager.description: Internal reference to the hiring manager's name or ID.

LinkClick.title: LinkClick
LinkClick.description: Represents a single click on a tracked referral link.

referrerId.description: The tradintaId of the user who shared the link.

shortLinkId.description: The ID of the shortlink that was clicked.

targetUrl.description: The destination URL the user was redirected to.

Manufacturer.title: Manufacturer
Manufacturer.description: Represents a manufacturer on the Tradinta platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the manufacturer entity.

shopId.description: Short, URL-friendly unique identifier for the shop.

slug.description: URL-friendly slug for the manufacturer's profile page.

tagline.description: A short, catchy slogan for the shop.

description.description: Description of the manufacturer and their products.

searchKeywords.description: A denormalized list of lowercase keywords for efficient searching.

contactEmail.description: Public contact email address for inquiries.

suspensionDetails.description: Details regarding the suspension of a shop.

isSuspended.description: Whether the shop is currently suspended.

prohibitions.description: Specific actions the seller is prohibited from doing.

publicDisclaimer.description: If true, a disclaimer is shown on the public profile.

isDemoted.description: If true, this manufacturer will be negatively ranked in discovery.

theme.description: Identifier for the selected shop theme (e.g., 'tradinta-blue', 'forest-green').

marketingPlanId.description: The ID of the active marketing plan this seller is subscribed to.

planExpiresAt.description: The timestamp when the current marketing plan expires.

Buyer.title: Buyer
Buyer.description: Represents a buyer on the Tradinta platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the buyer entity.

name.description: Name of the buyer (company or individual).

country.description: The country where the buyer is located.

county.description: The county within Kenya where the buyer is located.

tradPointsStatus.description: Details regarding the user's status in the TradPoints program.

isBanned.description: If true, the user cannot earn or spend points.

banReason.description: The reason provided by an admin for the ban.

lastClaimedAt.description: Timestamp of the last time the user claimed a TradPoints code.

Dispute.title: Dispute
Dispute.description: Represents a dispute filed by a buyer against a seller for a specific order.

orderId.description: The ID of the order being disputed.

reason.description: The primary reason for the dispute (e.g., 'Item not as described', 'Item not received').

details.description: A detailed explanation from the buyer.

resolution.description: The final outcome of the dispute, set by an admin.

fault.description: Who was deemed at fault, if anyone.

ProductCategory.title: ProductCategory
ProductCategory.description: Represents a product category in the marketplace.

displayOrder.description: Order in which to display the category.

Product.title: Product
Product.description: Represents a product listed on the Tradinta marketplace.

id.description: Unique identifier for the product entity.

manufacturerName.description: Denormalized name of the manufacturer for search and display.

manufacturerSlug.description: Denormalized slug of the manufacturer for URL generation.

searchKeywords.description: A denormalized list of lowercase keywords for efficient searching.

options.description: Defines the types of variants, e.g., ['Size', 'Color']

wishlistCount.description: Number of times this product has been added to a wishlist.

marketingPlanId.description: Overrides the seller's plan for this specific product.

isDemoted.description: If true, this product will be negatively ranked in discovery.

ProductVariant.title: ProductVariant
ProductVariant.description: Represents a specific version of a product (e.g., size, color).

price.description: B2B price of this specific variant.

retailPrice.description: Optional B2C (Tradinta Direct) price for this variant.

stock.description: Inventory count for this specific variant.

sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit for this variant.

attributes.description: Key-value pairs for the variant options, e.g., {'Size': 'Large', 'Color': 'Red'}.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents an order placed on the Tradinta platform, covering both B2B and B2C.

id.description: Unique identifier for the order entity.

buyerId.description: Reference to the Buyer who placed the order.

buyerName.description: Denormalized name of the buyer for quick display.

sellerId.description: Reference to the Manufacturer who will fulfill the order.

sellerName.description: Denormalized name of the seller for quick display.

orderDate.description: Date and time the order was placed.

subtotal.description: The pre-fee amount of the order.

platformFee.description: The fee charged by the platform for this order.

processingFee.description: The fee charged by the payment gateway.

amountPaid.description: The amount that has been paid so far.

balanceDue.description: The remaining amount to be paid.

lpoUrl.description: URL to the uploaded LPO document.

status.description: Current status of the order (e.g., 'Pending Payment', 'Processing', 'Shipped', 'Delivered').

items.description: List of all items within the order.

isTradintaDirect.description: If true, this is a B2C order fulfilled by Tradinta.

relatedQuotationId.description: If the order was created from an RFQ, this links to it.

shippingAddress.description: The full shipping address for the order.

OrderItem.title: OrderItem
OrderItem.description: Represents a specific item within an order.

unitPrice.description: Price of a single unit of the product at the time of purchase.

variantId.description: Optional reference to a specific ProductVariant.

variantAttributes.description: Denormalized attributes of the variant, e.g., {'Size': 'Large'}.

Shop.title: Shop
Shop.description: Represents a manufacturer's shop on the Tradinta platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the shop entity (matches manufacturerId).

slug.description: URL-friendly slug for the shop profile.

Payment.title: Payment
Payment.description: Represents a payment made through TradePay.

id.description: Unique identifier for the payment entity.

paymentDate.description: Date and time the payment was made.

paymentMethod.description: Method of payment used (e.g., M-Pesa, card).

transactionId.description: Transaction ID from the payment gateway.

status.description: Status of the payment (e.g., pending, completed, failed).

MarketingCampaign.title: MarketingCampaign
MarketingCampaign.description: Represents a marketing campaign run by a manufacturer.

assignedPartnerId.description: Optional UID of a Growth Partner this code is exclusive to.

GrowthPartner.title: GrowthPartner
GrowthPartner.description: Represents a Growth Partner's public profile and service offerings.

userId.description: The user ID of the partner.

bio.description: A short biography about the partner.

isPublic.description: Whether the profile is visible on the public marketplace.

isAcceptingPartnerships.description: If the partner is open to new collaborations.

services.description: A list of a-la-carte services offered by the partner.

PartnerService.title: PartnerService
PartnerService.description: A specific promotional service offered by a Growth Partner.

description.description: Details about what the service includes.

GrowthPartnerCampaign.title: GrowthPartnerCampaign
GrowthPartnerCampaign.description: Represents a specific promotional campaign linking a Growth Partner to a Manufacturer.

partnerId.description: The UID of the Growth Partner.

trackingCode.description: Unique code for this partner-manufacturer link.

AttributedSale.title: AttributedSale
AttributedSale.description: Logs a sale attributed to a Growth Partner.

partnerId.description: The UID of the Growth Partner.

campaignId.description: The campaign this sale is attributed to.

Payout.title: Payout
Payout.description: Represents a payout of commissions to a Growth Partner.

Quotation.title: Quotation
Quotation.description: Represents a Request for Quotation (RFQ) from a buyer to a seller.

source.description: The page source where the quote was initiated (e.g., 'product_page', 'compare').

Review.title: Review
Review.description: Represents a product review submitted by a buyer.

PointsLedgerEvent.title: PointsLedgerEvent
PointsLedgerEvent.description: An immutable, append-only event representing a change in a user's points balance.

user_id.description: The user ID this event applies to.

points.description: The number of points awarded or revoked (can be negative).

reason_code.description: A machine-readable code for why the points were issued.

metadata.description: Additional data, like order ID or referenced event IDs.

issued_by.description: Identifier for the system or admin that issued the event.

event_hash.description: Cryptographic hash of the event's contents for integrity.

LedgerBlock.title: LedgerBlock
LedgerBlock.description: A block containing a batch of ledger events, forming a cryptographic chain.

block_hash.description: Cryptographic hash of the block's contents and the previous block's hash.

prev_hash.description: The hash of the preceding block in the chain.

merkle_root.description: The Merkle root of all event hashes within this block.

event_ids.description: An array of event IDs included in this block.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the block was created.

FeatureUsage.title: FeatureUsage
FeatureUsage.description: Logs a specific feature usage event by a user.

Report.title: Report
Report.description: Represents a user-submitted report about content or behavior.

SystemAlert.title: SystemAlert
SystemAlert.description: Represents a system-generated alert for admin attention.

type.description: A machine-readable key for the alert type (e.g., 'NEW_USER_REPORT').

message.description: A human-readable summary of the alert.

details.description: Additional context, like a report ID or user ID.

PlatformSettings.title: PlatformSettings
PlatformSettings.description: Global settings for the Tradinta platform, including points configuration.

platformFee.description: Configuration for the platform transaction fee.

processingFeePercentage.description: The percentage fee charged by the payment processor (e.g., Paystack).

buyerSignupPoints.description: Points for a buyer signing up and verifying email.

buyerPurchasePointsPer10.description: Points a buyer earns for every 10 KES spent.

buyerReviewPoints.description: Points a buyer earns for submitting a product review.

buyerReferralPoints.description: Points a referrer earns when a new buyer signs up and verifies.

sellerVerificationPoints.description: Points a seller earns upon successful profile verification.

sellerSalePointsPer10.description: Points a seller earns for every 10 KES of sale value.

sellerFirstProductPoints.description: Points a seller earns for publishing their first product.

sellerFiveStarReviewPoints.description: Points a seller earns for receiving a 5-star review.

globalSellerPointMultiplier.description: A global multiplier for points earned by verified sellers from sales.

allowUnverifiedUploads.description: If true, new sellers can upload products before being fully verified.

enableTradintaDirect.description: If true, the B2C 'Tradinta Direct' functionality is enabled across the platform.

enableTradePay.description: If true, the TradePay wallet and payment system is enabled across the platform.

ClaimCode.title: ClaimCode
ClaimCode.description: Represents a redeemable code for TradPoints.

points.description: The number of points this code is worth.

claimedBy.description: The user ID of the user who claimed the code.

Following.title: Following
Following.description: A document representing a follow relationship, stored in a user's `following` subcollection.

type.description: The type of entity being followed.

followedAt.description: Timestamp of when the follow action occurred.

Follower.title: Follower
Follower.description: A document representing a follower, stored in an entity's `followers` subcollection.

userId.description: The UID of the user who is following.

followedAt.description: Timestamp of when the follow action occurred.

ForgingEvent.title: ForgingEvent
ForgingEvent.description: Represents a time-limited, tiered-discount promotional event.

Pledge.title: Pledge
Pledge.description: Represents a buyer's commitment to purchase a product during a Forging Event.

MarketingPlan.title: MarketingPlan
MarketingPlan.description: Stores pricing and details for a marketing plan tier.

name.description: The display name of the plan (e.g., 'Tradinta Lift').

price.description: The monthly price of the plan.

features.description: List of feature keys included in this plan.

goal.description: A short tagline describing the plan's main objective.

isPopular.description: If true, the plan is highlighted as 'Most Popular'.

requiresSalesContact.description: If true, the CTA will be 'Contact Sales' instead of direct purchase.

WishlistItem.title: WishlistItem
WishlistItem.description: Represents a product in a user's wishlist.

addedAt.description: Timestamp of when the product was added.

Shipment.title: Shipment
Shipment.description: Represents a physical shipment for a Tradinta Direct order.

AdSlot.title: AdSlot
AdSlot.description: Represents a manual override for a specific promotional placement on the site.

type.description: The type of entity this slot features.

pinnedEntities.description: A list of entities pinned to this slot.

expiresAt.description: Optional expiration for the manual override.

updatedBy.description: UID of the admin who last updated it.
